title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reimagine mainframe workloads at speed with agentic AI - ft Itau & ADP (MAM207)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用智能体AI快速重新构想大型机工作负载 - 特邀伊塔乌银行和ADP (MAM207)
abstract: Join leaders from ADP and Itau as they share how they reimagined their mainframe-based mission-critical systems. Dive deep into their transformation journey, exploring crucial architectural decisions, risk mitigation strategies, and lessons learned. Discover how they leveraged AWS Transform's automated code analysis, documentation, and business rules extraction, paired with other AWS developer tools, to achieve efficiency gains in reverse engineering, forward engineering, and testing. Whether you're at that starting line or already moving through your modernization journey, this session offers valuable insights from organizations that have successfully accelerated from legacy systems with AWS Transform.
abstract_cn: 加入来自ADP和Itau的领导者，了解他们如何重新构想基于大型机的关键任务系统。深入探讨他们的转型之旅，探索关键的架构决策、风险缓解策略和经验教训。了解他们如何利用AWS Transform的自动化代码分析、文档编制和业务规则提取功能，结合其他AWS开发者工具，在逆向工程、正向工程和测试方面实现效率提升。无论您是刚刚起步还是已经在现代化转型过程中，本次会议都将为您提供来自成功使用AWS Transform加速传统系统转型的组织的宝贵见解。
